name: Unhealthy Dungeon
description:
Game Created for the LudumDare #40. 

Theme: The more you have, the worse it is.

======= 

God makes your life to always... grow, which is not always good

Watch out your life bar to have the skills you need for progressing

Controls

   Movement : Left / Right arrow keys

Special Skills

   Jump: Space
   Fly: Up Key
   Fire: Left Ctrl
